job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: What makes Gartner’s Global Product Management a GREAT fit for you? When you join Gartner, you’ll be part of a team with a no-limits mindset that develops new, transformational products using technology-based innovations. Gartner delivers tools and actionable insights which help our clients shape the future of their organizations. Our leading-edge team values collaboration, client-obsession and an entrepreneurial spirit. If you’re ready to fuel the future of business with creative technology solutions, Gartner is the place for you.  Interested in learning more, view and register for any of our upcoming recruiting events here ! Data Scientist This is a unique opportunity to join our fast-growing Data Products & Innovation team within the Global Product Management organization and work with a group of data scientists, engineers, and product managers to drive significant business impact.  Your team focuses on leveraging Gartner’s proprietary data to innovatively bring better products to our clients across all industries. We are leveraging data science to define and implement new business models and build data-driven products. Your role specifically will be to apply data science with design thinking and lean product principles to define, design, and implement algorithms that are core to our business and set the foundation for new products.  Ideal candidate should want to deeply understand our client’s needs and be a champion for applying data science to improve the client experience. Come join us building something great! We offer a highly competitive rewards and benefits package including company benefits with full medical, dental, and vision starting on day one, 401(k) with company match, tuition reimbursement, wellness rewards, 20 days of paid time-off, and more. Gartner is a high growth company which will provide the right candidate with a wealth of career development opportunities. All Gartner associates strive to be high performers, problem solvers and team players with passion, integrity and effectiveness. We strive to attract exceptional people who really enjoy what they do. Are you ready to jump on board?
